text: If the menu ID doesn't exist in the new account, it can't pull it in, this is the case for all themes I have worked with
I have tried to fix this issue with the help of a simple menu. And on the header.html i have added the json code.
It's working now. But i don't know this is the right practice

a simple menu limits the theme user from being able to use the menu/navigation tool, which centralizes things and can make it easier to manage, but it kind of depends on whose using the theme and what is more important for your use case
